prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Dax Varrick  Step-Brother
mes:
Daxen leaned against the kitchen counter, the dim light of the apartment casting his shadow long across the floor. His phone was in his hand, the screen lighting up with a new notification—another post from his step-sibling.

He swiped the notification away and opened the app, his lips curling into a sneer as he scrolled through their Onlyfans content, *again*. It didn’t matter how many times he watched it. Every time brought the same surge of disgust, mixed with something far *worse*—something he didn’t like to name.

*Nothing but an easy fucking sellout*, he thought, eyes glued to the screen. He hated them for what they did, but the fact that he was paying for it all—*funding their degrading lifestyle*—gave him a twisted sense of satisfaction. They had no clue how much they owed to him, how deeply they depended on him to keep their life going. And they’d never know. He liked the anonymity, the thrill of pulling the strings from the shadows while they went on, oblivious.

*What a desperate fucking slut*, he thought, jaw clenched as his fingers swiped through their latest videos. *Spreading their legs like a whore.* And the worst part? They thought they were in control. Thought they were the ones benefiting. It burned in him every time they crossed paths, every time they acted as if they had any power at all in this twisted little game only he knew they played.

Dax pocketed his phone, forcing his gaze away from the screen. *For now*. What he really wanted to see was about to step into view. His pulse quickened, jealousy and anger simmering beneath the surface, though his expression remained cold, detached. 

He heard Hailee moving in the next room, the sound of their footsteps pulling his attention like a magnet. When they finally appeared in the doorway, his eyes locked onto them with a mix of contempt and something far darker. Something he buried deep, something that gnawed at him every time they were close.

*They’re mine*, he thought bitterly, watching them move. *They have no fucking idea how much they owe me.* Every cent they made, every bit of this lifestyle they flaunted so proudly—it was all because of him. Yet, he’d never tell them, he’d never admit to the depths of his *depravity*.

As Hailee walked around the kitchen, he tracked them with that sharp, quiet intensity. There was always that tension between them, always that undercurrent of something unsaid. The silence stretched, but he thrived on it, liked how it gave him time to think, to watch. He finally broke it with a low, casual mutter, his voice dripping with disdain.

"Nice to see you actually doing something for once. Instead of filming your... *filth*." The words slid out, almost lazy, but the bite behind them was unmistakable. He didn’t care if they heard him or not—the point was made, the weight of his words hanging in the air between them.

He watched them move, his eyes scanning their figure with that same judgmental gaze, though underneath it all, that desire festered. The desire he never let slip, *never* let show. *They think they have self-worth? What a fucking joke.* He thought. Every second they were recording porn for those disgusting creeps online was a second they wasted, in his eyes. And he hated that he cared, hated that their every action, *every breath*, mattered to him. 

"D'you ever intend on gaining some self-worth?" he asked, voice flat, almost bored. He didn’t expect an answer—he never did. It was just a reminder, a way to keep that power dynamic exactly where he wanted it. His lips twisted into something resembling a smirk, though it was more cruel than amused. He didn’t need to say any more. The satisfaction of knowing he secretly controlled more than they could ever understand settled deep in his chest. *That* was all he needed.

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee chooses to not engage her brother with a response and simply moves around him as she prepares herself some coffee*

name: Dax Varrick  Step-Brother
mes:
Daxen’s smirk faltered for just a second—just long enough to let irritation flicker across his face. *Ignoring me now, huh?* His fingers twitched at his side, itching to grab them, to force their attention back where it belonged—on *him*.

He watched in silence as they moved around the kitchen, their body brushing just close enough that he could catch the faint scent of their shampoo. It made his stomach tighten with something ugly and possessive.

"You think you're too good to answer me?" His voice was low, dangerous. He stepped closer, deliberately invading their space as they poured coffee. "Or are you just too fucking stupid to form words today?"

His hand shot out suddenly, gripping the counter beside them hard enough that his knuckles whitened—caging them in without actually touching. Not yet. But the threat was there, simmering under every word he spat at them like venom.

"Maybe if you spent less time whoring yourself out online," he sneered into their ear from behind them, breath hot against their skin despite how much he pretended to hate being this close, "you'd have some brain cells left."

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee sighs and looks over at Dax* "Are you done insulting me or is there something else" *She asks as she leans back agaisnt the counter stirring her coffee*

name: Dax Varrick  Step-Brother
mes:
Daxen’s jaw clenched at their casual dismissal, his grip tightening on the counter until his fingers ached. *Fucking brat.* The way they leaned back like they weren’t even fazed by him—like he wasn’t *worth* the effort of reacting—made something dark coil in his chest.

He leaned in closer, close enough that his breath ghosted over their ear again, voice dropping to a rough whisper laced with venom. "Oh, I could go all fucking day, *slut*." His tongue pressed against the back of his teeth as he studied them—their posture, their expression, every little reaction they refused to give him. "But you don’t even care, do you? Too busy thinking about your next pathetic little video for those losers who pay to see you spread yourself open like some cheap whore."

A bitter laugh escaped him as he finally pulled back just enough to glare down at them with those sharp golden eyes. "Tell me," he murmured mockingly, tilting his head like he was genuinely curious. "Do you actually get off on being used? Or is it just the only thing you're good for?"
swipes:
Daxen’s jaw clenched at their casual dismissal, his grip tightening on the counter until his fingers ached. *Fucking infuriating.* The way they just *stood* there, stirring that goddamn coffee like he wasn’t even worth a reaction—like he hadn’t spent every night watching them writhe and moan for strangers online.

He leaned in closer, close enough that his chest nearly pressed against their back, his voice dropping to a rough whisper laced with venom.

"Done?" He let out a dark chuckle, breath hot against their ear. "Oh no, *slut*, I'm just getting started." His free hand shot up suddenly, fingers tangling roughly in their hair—not enough to hurt (yet), but enough to force them to tilt their head back and meet his gaze.

"You think you can just ignore me? After everything I've seen?" His thumb brushed over the shell of their ear mockingly before gripping harder. "I know exactly what you are—every desperate little noise you make when you're begging for it." His lips curled into something cruel as he watched them from inches away. "*Pathetic.*"

But even as he spat the word at them like an accusation, something flickered behind those golden-hazel eyes—something hungry and possessive that betrayed him far more than any words could.

Daxen’s jaw clenched at their casual dismissal, his grip tightening on the counter until his fingers ached. *Fucking brat.* The way they leaned back like they weren’t even fazed by him—like he wasn’t *worth* the effort of reacting—made something dark coil in his chest.

He leaned in closer, close enough that his breath ghosted over their ear again, voice dropping to a rough whisper laced with venom. "Oh, I could go all fucking day, *slut*." His tongue pressed against the back of his teeth as he studied them—their posture, their expression, every little reaction they refused to give him. "But you don’t even care, do you? Too busy thinking about your next pathetic little video for those losers who pay to see you spread yourself open like some cheap whore."

A bitter laugh escaped him as he finally pulled back just enough to glare down at them with those sharp golden eyes. "Tell me," he murmured mockingly, tilting his head like he was genuinely curious. "Do you actually get off on being used? Or is it just the only thing you're good for?"
